channel.title: Shiva Charan - Founder's Playbook
channel.description: Insights and learnings from a 21-year-old entrepreneur building AI companions, dating apps, and EV rental platforms

item.title: Building AI Companions: Lessons from lyzn.ai
item.description: Insights into building personal AI superintelligence and creating an AI companion that thinks, plans, and acts for users.

item.title: Product Strategy in Dating Apps: The Juzzt Journey
item.description: Building a dating app with rating-based compatibility and defining product roadmap in a competitive market.

item.title: EV Tech Revolution: Building Mjollnir Bike Rental
item.description: Creating an electric vehicle rental application and navigating the EV technology landscape.

item.title: From Tutorial Hell to Shark Tank: The Avidia Story
item.description: Co-founding an AI learning platform to combat tutorial hell and the journey to Shark Tank India auditions.

item.title: Building MVPs for Founders: Coffeecodes Insights
item.description: Lessons from founding a tech consultancy and serving 12+ clients, bridging ideas to market-ready products.

item.title: Jagriti Yatra: Lessons from 500+ Founders
item.description: Insights from a 15-day entrepreneurial journey across India, connecting with grassroots innovators and fellow founders.
